location.title: Location
location.howToFindUsText: We are located on Herzl Street in the heart of Tel Aviv. The studio is easily accessible by public transport and there is street parking available nearby.

policies.title: Pricing & Policies
policies.feesText:
₪1,000 per hour (Minimum ₪2,000)
Cover-ups are ₪1,100 per hour (Minimum ₪2,200)
The final price depends on size and placement. Some areas such as ribs, neck or knee may require an additional fee depending on complexity.
policies.tippingText: Tipping is always up to you. It is never expected, but always appreciated. Please do not feel obligated to tip 20%. That is absolutely not required.
policies.depositsText: To secure your date, a ₪1,000 deposit is required. The deposit holds your appointment and goes toward the final cost of your tattoo. It is not an extra fee. The deposit is non-refundable for any reason. You are allowed one free reschedule. If you reschedule more than once, the original deposit is kept and a new deposit is required to book a new date.
policies.designPolicyText: I begin working on your design 1 to 3 days before your appointment. I do not send drawings over email or social media. If I need clarification, I will contact you. If you feel unsure about not seeing the sketch in advance, we can arrange a short meeting or video call to review it together. Minor changes can always be discussed. If the entire concept changes after booking, I may decline the new idea, cancel the appointment, and keep the deposit. If a full re-draw is required, it will be charged at my hourly rate and the appointment will need to be rescheduled.
policies.touchUpsText: You are always welcome to schedule a touch-up if needed Touch-ups are free within 3 months after your tattoo. After 3 months, touch-ups are charged at the regular hourly rate depending on what is required.
policies.agePolicyText: Clients must be 18 or older. For clients aged 16 and 17 parental consent may be required.
policies.faqText:
Is the sketch free?
Yes. The sketch is free. A ₪1,000 deposit is required to secure your date and begin working on your design. This amount goes toward the final tattoo cost. It is not an additional payment.

What does the deposit cover?
The deposit secures your appointment and allows me to begin preparing your custom design. It is subtracted from the final amount on the day of your tattoo.

What happens if I change my idea?
Small adjustments are fine. If the concept changes entirely after booking, I may cancel the appointment and keep the deposit. A new project requires a new deposit.

How is the final price calculated?
Pricing is based on actual working time and complexity. The final amount is calculated after the session is completed.

Do you do cover-ups?
Yes. Cover-ups are ₪1,100 per hour with a minimum of ₪2,200.

aftercare.title: Tattoo Day & Aftercare
aftercare.beforeAppointmentItems:
Get a good night of sleep
Eat a proper meal before you arrive
Avoid alcohol the day before
Wear comfortable clothes that make the tattoo area easy to access
If needed, shave the area in advance (or I can help at the studio)
aftercare.tattooDayItems:
Bring a valid ID
We confirm size and placement together
I prepare the stencil and transfer it until you're happy with the placement
Please try to stay still during the session (tell me if you need a break)
After the tattoo, we'll take photos, then I'll apply aftercare protection and explain next steps
aftercare.aftercareInstructionsItems:
You'll leave with a protective film (Second Skin)
Keep it on for 3–7 days (minimum 3 days)
After removal: wash gently with warm water
Apply a thin layer of unscented moisturizer (e.g. Bepanthen Plus, or similar)
Keep the area clean and dry
Avoid soaking (sea, pool, hot springs) for at least 3 weeks
Avoid direct sunlight; use sunscreen once fully healed
Do not scratch or pick flaking skin (pat gently if itchy)
aftercare.healingTouchUpsItems:
Healing time varies: small tattoos may take ~2 weeks, larger pieces longer
If you notice unusual redness, heat, swelling, or persistent bleeding, contact a doctor
Touch-ups are free within 3 months after your tattoo
After 3 months, touch-ups are charged depending on what's needed
